Before you make your first homework or reading, customize your question library by removing questions you don’t want your students to get.

steps.title: View questions
steps.body: Select chapters you plan to assign, then scroll down and click Show Questions. And don’t worry — students never get questions from sections you don’t assign.

steps.title: How OpenStax Tutor uses questions
steps.body: In addition to the questions you assign your students, OpenStax Tutor assigns personalized questions for each student from the sections you have assigned.

steps.title: Reading vs Homework
steps.body: Click “Reading” to view questions reserved for reading assignments. To view questions you can assign as homework, click “Homework.”

steps.title: Excluding questions
steps.body:
See a question you don’t like? Hover over it and click “exclude.”

[best-practices]: Don’t exclude too many — OpenStax Tutor needs several questions to make its personalized recommendations.

steps.title: Details View
steps.body: See question details and report a question error by hovering over it and selecting “Question details.”
